data.actual_result: Emojis like TM, multiply, copyright, etc are extremely difficult to see on Dark Theme. Note that it occurs in both emoji picker and in chat
data.expected_result: As in previous builds, they should have a color similar to the heavy_dollar_sign emoji, which is decently easy to see (refer to screenshot for comparison)
data.short_description: Emojis such as TM, Copyright, etc are almost completely invisible on Dark theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Open your emoji picker - Navigate to the symbol tab - Observe TM, Copyright, etc emojis
